# init(configuration:delegate:)

**Initializer**

Creates a view controller using the specified pass configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(configuration: PKAddSecureElementPassConfiguration, delegate: (any PKAddSecureElementPassViewControllerDelegate)?)
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: The configuration that the view controller uses to create a Secure Element pass.
- **delegate**: An object that acts as the view controller’s delegate.

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddSecureElementPassViewControllerDelegate] protocol. The view controller doesn’t retain the delegate.
title: init(configuration:delegate:)
